duck: Digital Scriptorium - The Digital Scriptorium (DS) is a non-commercial online image database of medieval and Renaissance manuscripts, or manuscripts made in the tradition of books before printing.
Armenian Illuminated manuscript - Armenian illuminated manuscripts form a separate tradition, related to other forms of Medieval Armenian art, but also to the Byzantine tradition.
block letters - Block letters are a sans serif gothic style Roman letters in which the letters are individual glyphs.
manuscript definition: written by hand or typed.

Genkō yōshi - Genkō yōshi is used for vertical writing (although by turning the page sideways it can be used for horizontal writing too), and is most commonly printed in lines of twenty squares, with ten ...
Gospel Book - The Gospel Book, Evangelion, or Book of the Gospels (Greek: Evangélion) is a codex or bound volume containing one or more of the four Gospels of the Christian New Testament — no...
Dead Sea Scrolls - The Dead Sea Scrolls are a collection of 972 texts discovered between 1947 and 1956 at Khirbet Qumran in the West Bank.
A manuscript is any document written by hand, as opposed to being printed or reproduced in some other way.

wiki.text:
seated in a capital "U" in an illuminated manuscript from the Badische
 Landesbibliothek, Germany.]] 's History of the Peloponnesian War]] A
 'manuscript' is any document written by hand, as opposed to being printed or
 reproduced in some other way. Before the arrival of printing, all documents and
 books were manuscripts. In publishing and academic contexts, a manuscript is
 the text submitted to the publisher or printer in preparation for publication,
 regardless of the format. Until recently a typescript prepared on a typewriter
 was usual, but today a digital file with a printout, prepared in manuscript
 format is most common.

Manuscripts are not defined by their contents, which may combine writing with
mathematical calculations, maps, explanatory figures or illustrations.
Manuscripts may be in book form, scrolls or in codex format. Illuminated
manuscripts are enriched with pictures, border decorations, elaborately embossed
initial letters or full-page illustrations. They were written by earlier people.
